issue.title: [CI] Nightly integration build with spark master failing to compile spark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `test-conda-python-3.8-spark-master` nightly builds are failing at the moment, see eg https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3469630203

There is a long output, which includes (not fully sure if this is the relevant part):

```Java

...
Error:  ## Exception when compiling 494 sources to /spark/sql/catalyst/target/scala-2.12/classes
...
```


cc `[~bryanc]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13814?focusedCommentId=17407801) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
